Name: 3x3 mini-Shogi
About the game: This video game is creating to referencing to Japanese traditional board game 'Shogi'. Shogi is a game very similar to chess. You choose 3 pieces and play 3 times for play on board of 9 squares with limited pieces. You don't need to know how to move the pieces. This game will guide you.
